tag_list: mobiroo, scott-miller, scott, miller, mobile-app, app-gifting, app-gift-cards
overview:
Sales/Business Development/Marketing

Scott is the Director of Sales and Marketing for Mobiroo, a Toronto-based mobile start-up. He has led the company’s sales and marketing efforts since 2011, over which time the business has expanded into over 20 countries multiple new products.

Prior to Mobiroo, Scott was the Public Relations Officer for Hydro One Networks.

Scott has an Advanced Certificate in Digital Media Marketing from NYU, and holds an HBA Degree (Specialization in Entrepreneurship) from the Richard Ivey School of Business at Western University in London, Canada.
